  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class VkBindBufferMemoryInfoKHR
extends VkBindBufferMemoryInfo
    See VkBindBufferMemoryInfo.

    Layout

    
 struct VkBindBufferMemoryInfoKHR {
     VkStructureType sType;
     void const * pNext;
     VkBuffer buffer;
     VkDeviceMemory memory;
     VkDeviceSize memoryOffset;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • VkBindBufferMemoryInfoKHR

        public VkBindBufferMemoryInfoKHR​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a VkBindBufferMemoryInfoKHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
